JobTitle: PDM Consulting  UX Tech lead UI Angular JS Developer - Enterprise Performance
JobFullDesc: Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology - a solutions builder, a roll-up-your-sleeves technologist who wants a daily collaborative environment, think-tank feel and share new ideas with your colleagues - without the extensive demands of travel?
